headlines.headline: 'Yan gudun hijiran da suka samu matsuguni a fursuna clone
headlines.overtyped: 'Yan gudun hijiran da suka samu matsuguni a fursuna clone overtype

items.summary: A Najeriya, an fara samun kwanciyar hankali a garin Nimbo na jihar Enugu, wanda ake zargin wasu makiyaya sun kai wa hari a kwanakin baya. Ga hotunan da Abdussalam Ibrahim ya dauko mana daga garin clone summary.

indexImage.altText: Hamed Karmi da matarsa, Farishta Morahami, sun tsere ne daga wani kauye ne da ke kusa da Kabul, babban birnin kasar Afghanistan, gabannin hare-hare daga kungiyar Taliban. Sun shaida cewa sai da suka biya masu safarar mutane dala 8,000 domin samun shiga Turai.
indexImage.caption: Hamed Karmi da matarsa, Farishta Morahami, sun tsere ne daga wani kauye ne da ke kusa da Kabul, babban birnin kasar Afghanistan, gabannin hare-hare daga kungiyar Taliban. Sun shaida cewa sai da suka biya masu safarar mutane dala 8,000 domin samun shiga Turai.

imageThumbnail.altText: Hamed Karmi da matarsa, Farishta Morahami, sun tsere ne daga wani kauye ne da ke kusa da Kabul, babban birnin kasar Afghanistan, gabannin hare-hare daga kungiyar Taliban. Sun shaida cewa sai da suka biya masu safarar mutane dala 8,000 domin samun shiga Turai.

items.overtypedSummary: A Najeriya, an fara samun kwanciyar hankali a garin Nimbo na jihar Enugu, wanda ake zargin wasu makiyaya sun kai wa hari a kwanakin baya. Ga hotunan da Abdussalam Ibrahim ya dauko mana daga garin clone overtype.
